idea_name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea_text: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
project_folder: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712

assets.artwork_prompt: Create an animated scene of a young woman with shoulder-length dark hair, wearing a rust-colored t-shirt and dark pants, sitting at a cozy coffee shop table. The warm, ambient lighting casts a soft glow around her, highlighting her puzzled expression as she looks at her smartphone screen. The scene captures the moment of realization, with her eyebrows raised and a slight frown forming. In the background, blurred figures of other patrons and the soft decor of the café create a relaxed atmosphere. On her phone, an exaggerated, cartoonish text bubble is visible, hinting at a suspicious message with a bank logo she doesn’t recognize, adding a humorous touch to the scenario. The camera angle is slightly over-the-shoulder, focusing on her reaction and the phone screen, illustrating the concept of receiving a scam text.
assets.artwork_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/artwork.png
assets.script: "Hey, I just got this weird text from a bank I don't even use! It looks like a scam trying to steal my info. Always double-check and never click on suspicious links!"

assets.srt_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/subtitles.srt
